attributes.action: form a public enquiry to question the legality of an unelected prime minister signing away British Powers to Brussels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
like many people thoughout britain, we are dismayed that this government, this prime minister in particular has ignored a manifesto pledge to hold a referendum on the lisbon treaty. 
surely it cannot be legal for an unelected prime minister, who has repeatedly refused calls for the public to decide whether he should hold office by means of a general election, to sign this treaty

rejection.details:
There are currently a number of similar petitions on the petitions site: 

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Lisbon-ref/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/ECTTOL/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/LeaveEU1/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
